question: Who has been honoured with the 2017 Brand Laureate Legendary Award?
explanation: Melody Queen Lata Mangeshkar has been honoured with the \'Legendary Award \' 2017 by Brand Laureate. The Brand Laureate Awards recognise world-class achievement in branding amongst individuals and companies. She is known for songs like “Lag jaa gale”, “Aayega aanewala”, “Aye mere watan ke logon”, “Luka chuppi”, and many more.
